[DQC.IFRS.0129.9605] It is expected that OtherReserves with a value of 369,000 reported in the network role http://www.pembridgeresources.com/xbrl/role/Consolidatedstatementoffinancialposition should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:OtherReservesMember and a reported value of 681,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.pembridgeresources.com/xbrl/role/Consolidatedstatementofchangesinequity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:OtherReserves fact are:
